description: The mask must be input as a fixel data file the same dimensions as the fixel data file(s) to be cropped.

arguments.description: input fixel directory, all data files and directions file will be cropped and saved in the output fixel directory
the input fixel data file defining which fixels to crop. Fixels with zero values will be removed
the output directory to store the cropped directions and data files
